website_summaries.verdict: Grip surfaces work well here to prevent sliding, and the price is very attractive considering you get two of them.
pros: Features grip surfaces on both sides to limit sliding
Offers good, high coverage on the seats
cons: Some of these arrive with a chemical odor that dissipates over time
Some buyers claim the straps break easily, and that the material breaks down or sheds easily

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: These come up nice and high, didn't have any trouble tightening the car seat down on it. It covers that area where the goldfish cracker go to die, making it easy to sweep them off. Picture is backseat of 2014 Toyota 4Runner and car seat is a Graco 4ever for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these seat covers to use under car seats in my van. I didn't like how a lot of other covers didn't attach at the top of the seat and you had to fold them over to rear face. I don't know about you, but my kids can kick higher up than those other covers, and I wanted to be sure the cover would stay in place. These have an adjustable strap to keep them on the seat and they go nice and high up the back of the seat. They were easy to install, and seem heavy duty. I love that there is a storage pouch on the front as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sticking under car seats. The first thing the kids want to do when they get buckled in is stick their feet up on the edge of the seat. Has stayed in place, I haven’t had to readjust, the fabric is really easy to wipe down. Would also work for helping keep food from falling down in the cracks, it has saved us from having to dig for toys/lost crayons/etc. Would buy again, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: chels_21

customer_reviews.title: Great seat covers!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat covers! They fit very well in my truck and are large enough to cover the entire seat. I would definitely recommend these! Plus the price is great for two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a much more expensive brand that we didn't like we decided to give this two pack a try. I love these! The fit our seats good. They cover a generous amount of seat and they are so easy to install! I will be buying another set! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mann

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the two pack with a convertible car seat for my husband and I. After reading reviews of the strap not making the back part of the mat stand the right way, I was a little nervous but, it fits perfectly in my Subaru Legacy. Theres even room to make it shorter! It fully covers the seat and theres even a rubberish grip on the back to keep it in place. Even after purchasing this due to being affordable, I was not disappointed in the quality. I would recommend and purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved! No more sliding while driving.
customer_reviews.text: I go this seat cover for my 4Runner driver's seat. I have leather seats and I love them but I slide down a bit while driving and am constantly adjusting myself position while on the road. It's been uncomfortable and frustrating. I really like my grey leather seats though and didn't want full seat covers that would hide them. When I came across this seat cover, I thought I'd try it. It's perfect for what I needed. No more sliding around on my leather driver's seat while driving. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: A.Singer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The cover, overall, seemed okay. However, while we were putting them on the seats, the mesh pocket ripped very easily. We're disappointed! Obviously if it ripped that easily, the kids getting things in and out of the pockets will surely rip them more. We're going on a 16 hr trip and I expect them to be totally off by the time we get to our destination... :( UPDATE: 1/11/19 After writing my review, I was quickly contacted by the company, who wanted to make things right. They send a replacement product, which has not seems fine. Maybe somewhere in manufacturing, there was a glitch with the one, making it easier to tear. Great costumer service!
customer_reviews.author: Karli Heiderich

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchase these back in June... We finally got to use one of them for a month now and the strap over the head rest has already ripped apart. Complete trash. It is too late to return them. Update: 1 year later... the company offered me the nicer set for free which I took for exchange for another review. They are much are much better than the ones I originally ordered but I’m only raising it from a 1 star to 3 stars because they were nice about it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these in our highlander and three in our f150 and they work great and fit both cars. They are sturdy material and definitely protect the seats. And they are designed so it's still easy to get to the buckle or latch system. I almost gave them four stars because the buckle/strap that goes around the headrest is a little flimsy but it doesn't really make a difference in how they function.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: So good had it for atleast
customer_reviews.text: Sooo far! So good had it for atleast... 🤔 few days. Doesnt slip i like that. And it does protect the actual space that takes up the 2 car seat I have graco extend and chicco nextfit and the material is really good. Dont get off guard just by unpacking. Its awesome. I would recommend this to every parent and for the price 😍👍🏼👍🏼✔️ Even better! Deal.
customer_reviews.author: Yaimary Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 children and need good car seat covers....I bought these car mats due to the reviews. Although the mats themselves seemed to be good material the straps were not. I've had them for ONE month and the straps that attach around head rest crumbled when I unclipped them to clean my car. My return eligibility date is over so this purchase was a waste of money!!! 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Maura R.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but wide
customer_reviews.text: These are great covers of you have a wide car seat or booster seat base. I find in my car though that the seat cover is too wide for the seat, covering the seat belt latch and makes it difficult for my 6yo to latch herself in as the cover obscures the receptacle. I may end up trying to find a narrower cover at some point. Car: VW Atlas, 2nd Row Captains chairs Carseat: Zipit Chicco Boosters
customer_reviews.author: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Shallow seat but works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. I bought this to protect my leather seats from my daughter's dirty shoes (she's still rear facing) and it works great. The seat portion is a little shallow for the backseat of my Escape, but its not too shallow for it to work well. Installs easily and seems to be well made enough to stand up to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great seat protectors!!
customer_reviews.text: ******UPDATE!! We’ve been using these for several months and they are fantastic!!!! We had a small mishap with one of them when cleaning it. We reached out to the company and the customer service was amazing! They got back to us right away and sent us a replacement!!! Very happy with the whole experience!!!!! So far these are GREAT!!! We have only been using them for about a month but so far so good!! It’s so nice not having to worry about constantly pulling up the back part to protect the seat bc it connects to the headrest with a strap!! Definitely very handy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these a lot! I have a Kia Sedona and I’m the carpool mom so, I had to have seat protectors! I got one set originally and I loved them so much I bought two more! Now my whole van is ready for these filthy little kids and their slime, snacks, and bloody noses. I have stow and go seats and these work perfectly!!! I only take them off to clean and that’s simple too: just throw them in the washer and I air dry mine but I’m sure they’d hold up in the dryer. I knocked a star off for durability because one of the storage/netted pockets ripped right off the bottom of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: TBone

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!  No drawbacks to this product!
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend this car upholstry protector -- would work for protecting from car seat indentations (this is what we're using ours for) or from dirty or wet pets and their muddy paws! The product is sturdy and does protect our car upholstry on the regular seat from the sharp edges of our new infant/toddler/big kid car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Molly C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, one cover was not 100 percent
customer_reviews.text: We really the price and fit of our new covers. Unfortunately one of the two (purchased together) has a tear at the bottom, otherwise it would be a five star product review all the way through. **update** Ohuhu contacted and rectified the problem with one of the covers. They are very professional and easy to work with. I changed the rating to a full five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: My whole family has these in their cars under the car seats to protect the seats. You can still crank on the strap to make sure the seat is in safely and properly. It is very thin as to not affect the safety of the car seat but still think enough to protect our seats. The slots are in perfect placement to be able to correctly place anchors. Comes in a two pack. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Minnat M Patel

customer_reviews.title: Work in my Subaru
customer_reviews.text: I had the seats replaced with leather in my Forrester and I really wanted to protect them from my kids car seat and booster. It’s been about a month and the seat protectors are holding up well. There are no dents in the leather. The only complaint is from my 5 year old, the seat cover is so wide that it blocks her seatbelt where it goes into the buckle. The seat cover is flexible enough that an adult can hook their seatbelt but she doesn’t like that she needs help now. She can get it after a few tries but it’s a little difficult from a raised high back booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for rear facing seats
customer_reviews.text: The trim around the seat covered is completely off within 3 weeks of using the cover for a rear facing car seat. I have another brand that I’ve used for 4 years that doesn’t have this issue. Thought I would try an item that was a bit cheaper and got what I paid for. Called for refund.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They work great. This is my second set since we're pregnant with our third child. Mine have held up the last 4 year's. Only complaint is that they don't go all the way to the top of our seats. It looks a little awkward when the kids are rear facing to only have the actual cover go up 3/4 way and they have the long straps on thr top 1/4. They work as excepted though
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Eh (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: Price is good but straps broke one day after install. 5.3.17: Ohuhu reached out in regards to my review, apologizing that I was not satisfied with their product. They did not have it in stock so instead offered me a refund. Four stars for service. Product still remains at 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: The Late Night Reader

customer_reviews.title: Large and durable!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Thick and durable so you know you’ll get good seat protection (I hate getting imprints on my seats from my kids car seats and these can handle their weight just fine). Also large enough to cover almost the entire surface area in my Honda Odyssey. Oh and the pockets hanging in front? So convenient for my kids little toys or wipes and whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t fit I’m still waiting for a return slip Y’all said it will fit a truck it don’t
customer_reviews.author: KEKE

customer_reviews.title: A little quality control would’ve been good
customer_reviews.text: One of two arrived like this. The buckle wasn’t sewn in. The other one is good. July2020 Update: Customer service was great. Had to wait for replacement causing them one star off. They were responsive, went above and beyond, and upfront which is a very good thing for me. If not for this hiccup, the product would’ve been five spankin stars. Everything about it is great. Would recommend buying products from Ohuhu.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher John Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Very nice great quality so far no tears. Material is sturdy. I feel like it would definitely protect my seat from any spills. It doesn't quite cover the whole back of my seat but that's ok I'm not worried about spilling something on my back. Would definitely recommend to someone looking for cheap but decent quality seat covers. I'm very happy I bought these
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one in Feb. of this year. Unfortunately I got a defective one and it broke within two months. However the company graciously sent a replacement within two days of my negative experience. They have wonderful customer service and were very concerned with making sure I was satisfied. I am happy with the replacement and it's working wonderfully. I recommend purchasing these. They fit in my truck perfectly and protect the seats from the car seats. I would purchase again for my next vehicle as well. Thank you Ohuhu!
customer_reviews.author: M. Behney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've used other car seat protectors with our first born, but this one by far is the best. What my husband and I like best about his product is the durability, the anti slip bottom, and the clean/sleek/simple look. To top it off, the customer service for Ohuhu is amazing. We received our package in 2 days, and unfortunately one of the two seat covers was ripped. I messaged Ohuhu customer service and they responded right away. In about 4 days 2 new seat covers arrived at my door. Love the product. Love the company.
customer_reviews.author: christine gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat cover alternative
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just as a cover for my driver seat. I have leather seats and don't like that my legs always stick. LOL. This is a great alternative to expensive seat covers. It fits every car I think & keeps the seat clean and gas storage pockets for your phone & every thing that usually falls out while driving. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but not great
customer_reviews.text: There really should be a strap at the bottom these things slide around like nobodies business. Not to mention there is no breathability so your back and bum sweat like crazy. It does as it is supposed to though and protects the main area of the sear but I would like a less shifty cover...
customer_reviews.author: Unspecified

customer_reviews.title: Not really water proof or spill proof
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s water proof or spill proof. It’s not. My car was soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Rémi

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger SUV seats
customer_reviews.text: We just bought these for our suburban, they will definitely work for the function, but they are too short for my kids to utilize the built in pockets which I was looking forward to. Their seats sit on top of the pockets, because of the seat size.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal and quality
customer_reviews.text: I impressed with the quality considering the price. Pockets available on the bottom part. Iwas expecting a light material and easy to break item but I was wrong. One of the good deals I bought here in amazon. Plus free bag. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mark Inocencio

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT WE HAVE EVER MADE FOR OUR VEHICLE.
customer_reviews.text: These are great when you have small children or in our case grandchildren occupying your backseat. Great way to protect the vehicle from all of their little messes. I am so happy that I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renee K. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Covers Most of the Seat
customer_reviews.text: Solid Product. The section that covers the seat-back almost covers all the way to the head rest. This protects most of my leather seats from getting dirty from my boys shoes. He likes to kick the seat from his rear facing car seat! lol
customer_reviews.author: ToneB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product we use these things so much trips, errands, rental car use! They 100% do their job! and are very thin but durable. The one spot on the hook had a thread that was coming loose but i sewed it up! great product and we have been using them almost a mo th now
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Match my car seat color.
customer_reviews.text: I have not open and use it yet. I'm sure I'll using it soon. Winter weather sure delays me putting it in my car. Hopefully it will last longer so will I'll find out.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Granlund

customer_reviews.title: A must for anyone with small children!!
customer_reviews.text: Having a 4yo always means messy car seats and crumbs everywhere. This seat protector does exactly what it says to keep my leather seats clean and sticky-free. It also eliminates those awful carseat creases and dents. Super easy to install and easy to take out to shake clean when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Total Boy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Just smells.
customer_reviews.text: I’m never one to complain about chemical smells on new products, but this one was unreal. I aired it out on my porch for a week in the sun and could still smell it as soon as I opened my car door. It protects and covers well, just smells.
customer_reviews.author: BriAnne Ledford

customer_reviews.title: but are just slightly smaller than I would like. I bought them to go under the Graco ...
customer_reviews.text: This will work for their intended purpose. They fit in my 2004 Jeep Grand Cherokee, but are just slightly smaller than I would like. I bought them to go under the Graco Click Connect car seat and it does not interfere with the installation of the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney S

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these protectors. When I took them out of the box I was very impressed with how durable they felt. I had my husband feel them and he told me to buy more (he didn’t realize they were car seat protectors and not seat covers lol). We have had them for 2 months now and are holding up fantastically!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has the strap so it doesn't slump down like others. Perfect for keeping dirty toddler footprints off of my seat
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have. They protect the leather from the car seats. And if the kids spill any fish it gets trapped on these and it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joe caler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, this seat protector is really nice and does what it suppose to do, it fits the car seat perfectly, really helps me to keep the leather seat clean, fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: eshine

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky
customer_reviews.text: These are super handy and easy to install. Not super bulky and difficult to get seats in. Not really high on the back of the seat, an older rear facing child could maybe still get the seat dirty. Overall, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: Work great on our 2019 Hyundai Tucson that I'd like the kids not to absolutely destroy with their constant eating and messes. They look nice and are easy to install. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: B. Tamarin

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Horrible chemical smell, and if you want an instant headache this is it. Seems well made and durable, but as others have stated, there is an overwhelming not-very-kosher smell coming from the material(s) used. Not sure that's very healthy to breathe, especially for a baby in a closed environment like a car. I'll let this thing off-gas in the garage for a while and see if I need to return it. Will update my review at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My son is still rear-facing but this seat protector is doing what it was designed to do, protecting the entire seat underneath the carseat from wear and tear as well as his dirty footprints. It's a very sturdy material that seems like it will last for many years. It grips the seat and does not slip. Haven't used the pockets yet but they are a nice touch. Great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my seats clean!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and even protect the seat back from the backward facing kicker, since the new recommendation is to keep them rear facing as long as possible. The pockets on the front are convenient too
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a good idea, until you have them! They fell apart after 1 road trip and all my kids did was complain about how they made their back sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job 👍
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They protect my new tshoe seats hmm they seem very durable. They have small pockets that hang over the seat. They are small so they cant be used for much but they hold pacis for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tojo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought to place beneath car seat and works well. Cheaper than one I had bought for my car (and received two with this rather than the one I got!) and I think it's engineered better. There is a flap that slides between the seat to ensure less movement. Great thinking!
customer_reviews.author: Nassir Ahmad Barekzi

customer_reviews.title: Straps break easily
customer_reviews.text: The straps that go around the headrest break easily with people getting in and out of the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Aarynne

customer_reviews.title: What I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, fits snug on the car seat and provides enough coverage to prevent damage. Ordering again for my husband's car. I used these on a 2018 Jeep Compass.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka_S

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: the front pockets ripped off soon as my son climbed in the car. Not the end of the world but was disappointed that it was not double stitched on as to hold up to normap use.
customer_reviews.author: Janeace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seat Protectors
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! My husband and I put one in each of our cars (2019 Tundra, 2018 4Runner) to place in between the seat and our sons car seat (Graco 4ever). Super easy to install, protects the seats wonderfully from wear & tear as well as spills from the boy. Highly recommend and very reasonable price point!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Must have for leather seats
customer_reviews.text: Loved it makes my car look clean .. protects my leather from.my kids carseats Bought two.more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Bellevue

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have zero complaints and they are holding up extremely well to my kids disgusting car habits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I like the material. Seems very easy to wipe off. I’m a little concerned about throwing them in the washing machine which was a super nice feature of the last ones I had. Over all for the price they seem to be well made and easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Soul Living

customer_reviews.title: Under-seat protection only
customer_reviews.text: These cover only under the carseatwithout any protection for the sides (where its needed most).
customer_reviews.author: Awesomus

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a 7 passenger suv and the carseat protector fitted perfectly in the middle captain seat. They are leather seat and I didn't want the carseat to ruin my suv seats. I read the reviews and decided to go ahead and get me one, and I'm very happy with my decision. Good quality too!!
customer_reviews.author: honestlee las vegas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in. Definitely helps clean up yucky toddler messes like vomit 🤢 but it does take a little scrubbing to clean it
customer_reviews.author: CariConner

customer_reviews.title: Prefer these
customer_reviews.text: I like that this set has headrest strap to help keep in place. Have another set in husbands car that doesn’t have the additional strap and I prefer these. Protects the seat and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiphany Price

customer_reviews.title: Great seat covers for car seats
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for seat protectors but they can be so expensive! I was drawn to these because there was two for a great price. We have been using them for months now and they keep my leather seats protected. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and sturdy fabrics
customer_reviews.text: The material of the seat cover is thicker than the one I bought at local store. It uses different fabric on both side of the cover, which makes the corners sturdy. The only complaint from my kid is that the back is too thick to make him sweat often.
customer_reviews.author: Tian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these! Just got a new car with very light leather seats and was told by the dealership that I would need to protect the seats from the dye on jeans. These are perfect for that! Love that they come up the back as well and the material is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S walker

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the others I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: These actually cover the seat, as opposed to some I’ve tried. Love that it hooks over the headrest as well as pockets into the seatback to keep it in place. Great way to keep those post-playground dirty shoes off the upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Nalukaikamahine

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: It fully covers the seat and there's even a rubberish grip on the back to keep it in place. good quality and don't slide with the car seats on them.
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: The front pocket at the bottom tore right off first day! :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy care, not great to sit on.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure these are great in terms of cleaning and durability, but these are horrible to sit on. Don’t breath for anything and not comfortable. Kind of defeats the purpose if no one wants to sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Onymous

customer_reviews.title: keeps seats clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my aunt who always spills drinks in her car. Really nice for covering seats to keep them from getting dirty and looks pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage but broken strap
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage but top strap broke after a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: pretty thin but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: probably won't protect our leather seats that much from car seat racheting down latch system, but better than no protection. easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: and the organizer on the front is great.
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought another brand of seat protector. This is much nicer! It's more pliable, the bottom has plenty of grip, and the organizer on the front is great.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Not safe with most carseats.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing I was informed that most car seats don't allow anything in between the seat and car seat for saftey reasons. Would rather my car get dirty than risk my child's saftey
customer_reviews.author: Bailie

customer_reviews.title: Serve the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: These work out great in my new car. It keeps spills from making it to my seats. My grandson, keeps a few cars and his mask and a hand sanitizer in the little pockets on the front of the seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Only problem I saw was it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Only problem I saw was it is a little short so the organizational pockets on the bottom are partially on the car seat itself. Not a big deal, since what I was using it for was to protect my leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cover is very Easy to install. Very good quality and fits well in the back seat. It also can keep the car seat cleaner and in better condition than without. Great car seat covers. great product!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY

customer_reviews.title: i have fabric chair covers but somehow my daughter kicks ...
customer_reviews.text: i have fabric chair covers but somehow my daughter kicks them up over her chair as soon as i put her in, with this one she can't do that and it helps from getting any of the fabric soiled!
customer_reviews.author: kaleonani

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Super thin car seat still leaves indents but helps keep seats clean at least
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great in my pathfinder and keep seats clean. Good quality and even came in cool storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Work great under my kids car seats to protect the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Straps that go around head rest snapped after a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Straps that go around head rest snapped after a week of use. Now this sits sadly folded over on itself atop our front passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Shoesformyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Seats Clean
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to keep my cloth seats clean. It has been great. A few people said the straps ripped when installing, so I just left a little slack, secured the child seat then tightened the straps. Otherwise, compressing the child seat would probably rip the already tightened straps on the seat protector.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping the seats clean!
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping footprints and scuff marks off the seat when the kids are getting in their seats and also prevents the infamous snacks from getting all over the seats. Highly recommend for trying to keep the car seats clean!
customer_reviews.author: Soxfan88

customer_reviews.title: Good size but smell
customer_reviews.text: The seat protector was a big enough to cover my SVU seats, and it has an adjustable straps. The two things that I don't like about the seat protector has this smell of plastic, so make sure to air out for a couple days before put it in the car. Another is thing is the seat protector is thin, so I don't know how long it will last. Overall, the set protector is good product.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick so nothing still transfers into my leather ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick so nothing still transfers into my leather seats. the top straps are nice to keep it from falling. But to be honest the pockets on the front are useless but not annoying
customer_reviews.author: jay hansen

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality on straps
customer_reviews.text: One side of the top strap broke off of both the covers within the first week - I expected better quality. The rest of the materials seem to be good and thick.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: ... I didn't have high expectations but I am very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: The price for the two was much lower than other similar seat covers so I didn't have high expectations but I am very happy with them. They are very well made and sturdy. I'm glad I gave them a chance.
customer_reviews.author: C Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great to protect your car!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have one under each car seat. They have already protected the backrest from tiny shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Affordable great seat covers.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I got these when I got my new car, and we have been really happy with them. They completely cover the seats and protect them from our car seats. They also help keep my seats clean from rear facing toddlers. I have recommended them to a few people and everyone is super happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Protect seat perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have fancy sests in my WRX and two car seats....good product, fits my every seat protection needs
customer_reviews.author: The Saeko

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER!
customer_reviews.text: BEST THING EVER!!! Protects our leather seats, makes crumb cleanup easy, and the pouches in front are perfect for little odds and ends that otherwise end up on the floor out of reach.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Got these to protect my seats in my new car. Working great and doing their job.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2girls

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Ripped hangstring and still gave dents in leather seats from car seats
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina M  Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t had any accidents yet to see if it ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had any accidents yet to see if it will work but I think it will. I have debated if I should have just gone with a backseat pet cover to protect the entire backseat.
customer_reviews.author: AddictedToAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Strong fabric with enough padding for protection without added bulk. Slip resistant rubbery material at the bottom so it won't slide around under the car seat when the seat gets moved around (like when you buckle your child or during hard steering). Came with a nice pouch that can hold both mats when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Metopia

customer_reviews.title: These were as expected and work just fine. The only downside was there was a terrible ...
customer_reviews.text: These were as expected and work just fine. The only downside was there was a terrible odor of new plastic that lasted a while after purchasing them. It was pretty strong at first. Otherwise product is in good durable condition and can withstand the wear and tear of the car seat base.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna F

customer_reviews.title: They easily clean, remove
customer_reviews.text: These have been a lifesaver for our leather seats in our car. They easily clean, remove, and are small enough you can sit on them. Such a great purchase if you are wanting something under your car seats!! Plus they have storage pockets for anything! I like to keep wipes and such for spills.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Megan Isom

product_meta.title: Ohuhu Car Seat Protector Under Car Seat 2 Pack, Non-Slip Car Seat Protector for Baby/Child Car Seat, Seat Cover for Carseats Dog Mat Vehicle Cover with Organizer
feature_bullets: SCRATCH & INDENTION FREE: The Ohuhu Car Seat Protector helps to holds your baby/child car seat in place without the rough treatment and prevents any scratches, indentions, scuffs or chips of your leather seat’s finish.

2-PACK, ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: What good is your car seat protector if it’s always slipping down? We know that’s a common problem, which is why the Ohuhu Car Seat Cover is made with an adjustable strap to tie the cover securely to the headrest as well as a handy tab to tuck between backrest and the seat. This ensures that the seat protector won’t slide downwards or cause discomfort for those sitting in the back. Just adjust the straps and you’re good to go!

WATERPROOF & EASY TO CLEAN: Leather or fabric seats can be a real pain to remove stains from, but polyester makes it painless! Not only are stains less likely to occur on the waterproof 600D polyester fabric with PU coating and a PVC leather edge, but the Ohuhu Car Seat Protector is also so easy to clean with a vacuum or damp cloth. Stains will be gone!

CONVENIENT MESH POCKETS: Sometimes cars don’t have quite enough pockets or storage space, so wouldn’t it be nice to have just a little more? Well now you do with the convenient mesh pocket design attached to the car seat, which allows you to stash toys, snacks, drinks, tissues and water bottles so your kids can access their most important items themselves.

COMPATIBLE WITH ALL SEATS: No matter what kind of vehicle you have, keep your seats as clean and nice as the day you bought your car! Use it in sedans, SUVs and trucks to protect against spills, scratches and pets for a cleaner backseat for everyone.
